paragraphs.content: I will praise thee with my whole heart: before the gods will I sing praise unto thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will praise thee with my whole heart: before the gods will I sing praise unto thee.

paragraphs.content: I will worship toward thy holy temple, and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: for thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will worship toward thy holy temple, and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: for thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.

paragraphs.content: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.

paragraphs.content: All the kings of the earth shall praise thee, O LORD, when they hear the words of thy mouth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All the kings of the earth shall praise thee, O Lord, when they hear the words of thy mouth.

paragraphs.content: Yea, they shall sing in the ways of the LORD: for great is the glory of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Yea, they shall sing in the ways of the Lord: for great is the glory of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: Though the LORD be high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Though the Lord be high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.

paragraphs.content: Though I walk in the midst of trouble, thou wilt revive me: thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies, and thy right hand shall save me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Though I walk in the midst of trouble, thou wilt revive me: thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies, and thy right hand shall save me.

paragraphs.content: The LORD will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O LORD, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O Lord, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
